wikipedia_page.main: Adam Strachan (born 24 February 1987) is a Scottish professional footballer who last played for BSC Glasgow in the Lowland Football League. Strachan came through the youth system at Partick Thistle and played almost 90 matches for the senior side, including a season in the Scottish Premier League. Since leaving The Jags, Strachan has only played in the Scottish Football League, with such clubs as Ross County, Dumbarton, Albion Rovers, Clyde, Stenhousemuir and latterly Arbroath as well as in Junior football with Clydebank, Irvine Meadow and Glenafton Athletic.
